name: Material Design
description:
More rounded, shadowed facebook. In the right way to get the Material Design.
YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/ItayGanor
additional_info: Release v1.0.1 * bug fixes and other improvements. Release v1.0.0 * Profile Images turns into a circle shape. * Chatlist & latest updates became less compressed. * LOTS of lines has removed. * Profile pic is in the center of the cover photo (and full name underneath). * Borders have become drop shadows. * The profile picture has hover effects when hover. * New color standard.
